attributes.action: stop ALL NHS Trusts from employing Any more administrative Managers/Clinical Directors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to stop ALL NHS Trusts from employing Any more administrative Managers/Clinical Directors i.e:- 20,000 extra administrators cost the NHS £500 MILLION, while sacking medical personnel and closing hospitals !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
